articles.title: Rugby-Hooker Marx wants Boks to match Argentina’s passion
articles.description: The Boks trail table-toppers New Zealand by two points and will likely have to win both home and away in their final two games against Argentina to stand a chance of taking the title. But they have blown hot and cold this season and battled for consistency as they come off a strong performance in the 24-8 win over Australia in Sydney last time out.
articles.content: South Africa hooker Malcolm Marx says the Springboks will have to match Argentina's intensity in their must-win Rugby Championship fixture in Buenos Aires on Saturday. The Boks trail table-toppers New Zealand by two points and will likely have to win... [1771 chars]

articles.description: Manu Ginobili looks back on his illustrious career that saw him win four NBA championships with the Spurs and an Olympic gold medal with Argentina

articles.title: Springboks star Elton Jantjies and team dietician sent home from Argentina as scandal rocks squad
articles.description: South Africa out-half Elton Jantjies has been sent home from Argentina, following media reports of an alleged affair with the team's dietician.
articles.content:
South Africa out-half Elton Jantjies has been sent home from Argentina, following media reports of an alleged affair with the team's dietician.
Zeenat Simjee, the dietician, has also been sent home.

articles.title: Argentina's four-time NBA champ Ginobili enters Hall of Fame
articles.description: Four-time NBA champion Manu Ginobili of Argentina looked back with affection on a career that spanned three continents and included Olympic gold on Saturday as he entered the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.
articles.content:
Four-time NBA champion Manu Ginobili of Argentina looked back with affection on a career that spanned three continents and included Olympic gold on Saturday as he entered the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.

articles.title: 2022 FIBA AmeriCup: Team USA eliminated in semifinals after loss to Argentina; to play in bronze medal game
articles.description: The U.S. was attempting to win back-to-back AmeriCup titles for the first time in over 20 years
articles.content: Team USA's dream of going back-to-back as FIBA AmeriCup champions is no more. On Saturday evening, the Americans were eliminated in the semifinals after an 82-73 loss to Argentina. Now, the Americans will face the loser of Brazil vs. Canada in the br... [1626 chars]

articles.title: World tango dancers flock to spiritual home Buenos Aires
articles.description: Over 500 tango dancers from Argentina and the world are congregating in Buenos Aires for a major festival of the dance in its spiritual home, with concerts, classes and a competition to compete for the international tango crown.
articles.content:
Japanese tango dancers Kozo Yamamoto, 74, and Yoshiko Mamada, 50, perform during the Tango World Championship salon qualifiers, in Buenos Aires, Argentina September 9, 2022. REUTERS/Lucila Sigal

articles.title: GRAPHIC-Argentina's depleted FX reserves get timely soybean boost

articles.title: Sea's Shopee shuts operations in Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Mexico: Sources
articles.description:
Firm to "focus resources on core operations" and will use cross-border model in Mexico, Colombia and Chile.
Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Sea's e-commerce arm told employees on Thursday it was shutting local operations in Chile, Colombia and Mexico, and leaving Argentina entirely, according to three sources with direct knowledge of the matter and an internal e-mail.
